TopicTitle: I have some problems with ExtraplanetaryLaunchpads

Articles.Content:
I want to set up a mun base with this mod. And use Kerbal Attachment System to link every parts

When I prepared everything I discovered that I can't build anything!

this is my mun base

i

After that,I tested it in KSC.I figure out that is becaus of Kerbal Attachment System.If I used it to link other parts,lannchpad will can't build.

like this

So who can tell me how to let them able to work together?

Moving this question to General Add-on Affairs, the place for all your mod-related questions.

Welcome aboard, Lizardon!

Do you have a workshop part? Like, even a hitchhiker would work. I can't see very well from that screen cap whether the part with the 3 solar panel is a hitchhiker or just an MK2 lander on top of something.

Right-click on all the parts that have Kerbals, and look at the "Productivity" value. You need a total productivity > 0 to build anything.

Also some of your Kerbals needs to be Engineers. See the 5.0.0 release notes

Right-click on all the parts that have Kerbals, and look at the "Productivity" value. You need a total productivity > 0 to build anything.

Also some of your Kerbals needs to be Engineers. See the 5.0.0 release notes

How can I improve my "Productivity"?

Now my "Productivity" is a very small negative.
